products.description:
Material: Galvanized or RAL 5005 / 7035
Frame Height: 2000 to 5500 mm
Frame Depth: 400 to 1200 mm.
Beam Length: 1200 to 2750 mm.
Description: Metal frame with footplate, suitable for storage systems and industrial structures. Made from high-strength steel, it allows multiple height and depth configurations, adapting to different load and space requirements. Available in galvanized or painted finish, ensuring durability and anti-corrosion protection in industrial environments.

Material: Galvanized or RAL 5005 / 7035
Frame Height: 1000 to 3000 mm
Frame Depth: 400 to 1200 mm.
Shelf Length: 750 to 1000 mm
Shelf Width: 300 to 600 mm
Description: The boltless metal clip shelving units are a practical and sturdy solution for spaces requiring efficient organization and high load capacity, such as warehouses, archives, or industrial areas. The modular system allows easy adjustment of shelf height, adapting the structure to specific usage needs. Assembly is quick and secure, through reinforced clips that ensure stability and prevent unwanted shifting. Made from robust steel, these shelves offer durability, flexibility, and an excellent response for different storage configurations, and can be sized to fit the available space.

Capacity: 1500 Kg
Weight without battery: 110 Kg
Weight with battery: 116 Kg
Voltage: 25.6 V
Battery capacity: 20 Ah Description: Our 1500 Kg electric pallet jack is ideal for quick and safe movement of loads in warehouses, logistics centers, or factories. Equipped with an electric motor and high-capacity battery, it allows precise maneuvers with minimal effort, increasing operational efficiency and reducing operator strain. The reinforced steel structure ensures robustness and durability, while the ergonomic design guarantees comfort and safety during heavy load transport. A reliable solution to optimize internal logistics and increase productivity.

Capacity: 3000 Kg
Description: Our high-capacity manual pallet jack solutions are ideal for moving and transporting heavy loads safely in warehouses, factories, or logistics centers. This model supports up to 3000 kg, ensuring robustness and reliability, with a reinforced structure of resistant steel. Operation is practical and efficient, allowing precise maneuvers even in tight spaces. An essential piece of equipment to optimize internal logistics and increase productivity, while always maintaining operator and goods safety.

Material: High-strength steel with electrostatic paint finish.
Dimensions: Height: 2 m to 8 m | Width: 1 m to 3 m | Depth: 0.6 m to 1.2 m.

Material: RAL 5005 / 7035
Height: 2400 mm
Width: 1500 to 1750 mm
Description: PORTECO shelving for vertical storage, composed of an initial module and continuation modules.
Z beams at ground level and at the top to ensure structure stability.
2 beams in 50x30 tube, applied to the back of the shelving, where separation arms are supported and slide. Includes 4 separation arms per module.
Each module features a 22mm OSB base.

Description: Medium-duty cantilever with single-sided access, suitable for horizontal storage of pipes, profiles, and other heavy objects. Evolutionary system composed of columns placed side by side at maximum intervals of 1000mm. Columns and feet in blue RAL 5005, arms and braces in gray RAL 7035. Has 4 levels (base + 3 levels) with possibility of extension to 5 levels. Mandatory floor fixation.

Frames: The frames are composed of two 50x50mm omega-section uprights, with front holes spaced 50mm apart. The connection between uprights is ensured by braces and diagonals bolted into the side holes of the upright. Floor support is provided by a bolted metal footplate. The footplate has holes to allow floor fixation using HST-type metal anchors.
Beams: The PORTECO system beams are Z-shaped, with a recess to allow application of 19mm thick particleboard or metal panels. At each beam end, a connector with 3 claws is welded, allowing easy and quick clipping into the front holes of the upright. The connector has dedicated holes for applying a safety lock, which functions as a mechanical fuse. We have two types of beams: Z60 or Z100, which can be used depending on the load to be stored.
Shelves: The PORTECO system can use two types of shelves: 19mm thick particleboard or modular metal panels, with galvanized finish.

Load per arm: up to 40Kg uniformly distributed (80Kg per pair of arms).
Description: Light cantilever, for manual loading, single-sided type (access from one side only). Base bolted to the cantilever column, with holes to allow floor fixation. Arm height adjustment in 50mm increments. The arms have anti-fall tops. Load per arm: up to 40Kg uniformly distributed (80Kg per pair of arms). Uprights and base with epoxy paint finish in blue, RAL 5005, arms in light gray, RAL 7035, braces and diagonals galvanized. Includes floor fixation. Dimensions: 800x400x2000mm (WxDxH) or 800x500x2000mm (WxDxH).

products.description:
Capacity: Up to 850Kg per level.
Description: Medium-duty storage system, very versatile and resistant. It is the ideal solution for storing heavy and bulky goods, which are moved manually. Available in two versions: Z100 and Z60

Description: Rang'Eco Tires shelving kits, which include: frames (welded braces and diagonals), and main beams in ovalized tube. There are two types of kits: Initial module (single) and Following module, which connects to the initial module, sharing one of the frames. Can have 3 levels (frame with 2000mm height) or 4 levels (frame with 2400mm height) per module. Level height adjustment is in 50mm increments. One reinforcement brace per level is considered.

Max weight per level: Up to 303kg
Max number of levels: Up to 7 levels
Number of available depths: Up to 6 different depths
Number of available lengths: Up to 4 different lengths MAXIMUM HEIGHT: Up to 3 meters
Description: Rang'Eco Plus is a robust solution for loads up to 303 kgs per level. It offers greater capacity and durability, ideal for warehouses, workshops, and facilities needing a reliable structure.

Description: Multipurpose workbench, built with PORTECO frames, with metal legs and Z beams. White melamine top 22mm thick with perimeter edging. Possibility of having a lower shelf. Length: 1200, 1600 and 2000mm. Depth: 800mm. Standard colors: blue RAL 5005 (legs) and gray RAL 7035 (beams). Can be made entirely in blue or gray.

Description: Rang'Eco shelving kits, which include uprights, feet, shelf structure, which we consider as integral: the two main beams, two braces, and reinforcement tube(s) (300 and 400mm - 1 tube, 500 and 600mm - 2 tubes, 800mm - 3 tubes). There are two types of kits: Initial module (single) and Following module, which connects to the initial module, sharing two of the uprights. To complete the kits, you must select the type of covering to place on the shelf structure, considering two options: platex or metal sheet. Individual packaging in shrink-wrap plastic film.

sobreNos.title: ABOUT VASTO IMPÉRIO LDA.
sobreNos.p1t: Over 20 years of experience in storage solutions
sobreNos.p1: Vasto Império Lda. has been operating for over 20 years in the sector of shelves, racks, light-duty shelving units, manual and electric stackers, pallet jacks, and other storage equipment. Over these years, we have earned the trust of numerous clients in Portugal, offering quality products and professional services.
sobreNos.p2: Headquartered in Benedita, Vasto Império Lda. recently expanded its activity to Viseu, reinforcing proximity to our clients and response capacity to market needs.
sobreNos.p3: In addition to equipment sales, we offer assembly and delivery services, ensuring complete solutions adapted to each storage project. Our commitment is to provide safe, durable, and efficient products, with maximum attention to customer satisfaction.
sobreNos.p4: Our accumulated experience and constant updating with the latest trends and technologies allow us to offer innovative and competitive solutions. Vasto Império Lda. is the right choice for companies, independent professionals, and individuals seeking quality, reliability, and specialized service.
